text: I think one of the most pervasive evils in this world is greed and acquiring money for money's sake. Once you have six houses and a plane, it's just about a number. It's never been anything I understood.
author: Kevin Bacon

text: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
author: Kinky Friedman

text: Now, people when I say that look at me and say, 'What are you talking about, Joe? You're telling me we have to go spend money to keep from going bankrupt?'. The answer is yes, that's what I'm telling you.
author: Joe Biden

text: It is a fact that around the world the elites of every country are making money.
author: Hillary Clinton

text: Economy does not lie in sparing money, but in spending it wisely.
author: Thomas Huxley
